data.title: All Saints Hockerill
data.meta_description: We are a close and caring community, encouraging one another in faith, friendship and volunteering. We recognise that we are not perfect, but are discovering the difference that being part of the Church makes to our lives. Whether you are new to Bishop’s Stortford, looking for a spiritual home, or curious about Christianity, we hope you will feel at home at All Saints’.
data.text:
Community

We are a close and caring community, encouraging one another in faith, friendship and volunteering. We recognise that we are not perfect, but are discovering the difference that being part of the Church makes to our lives. Whether you are new to Bishop’s Stortford, looking for a spiritual home, or curious about Christianity, we hope you will feel at home at All Saints’.
